tasks.task: Combine inoculant with seed-applied pesticides for legume crops.
subtasks: Determine compatibility between thioram, ppct, and inoculant bacteria.
Select appropriate inoculant application method (granule or liquid stream).
Choose between peat slurry or EasyRise freeze-dried bacteria for liquid application.
Separate fungicide and insecticide from inoculant application when possible.
Consider soil moisture and sowing timing for optimal nodulation.
Double bacteria dose in treatments affected by pesticides.
Plant in moist soil conditions whenever feasible.
Rotate crops to existing legume paddocks for sustained inoculum.
